parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference value as defined in swUserPreferenceDoubleValue_e

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Numeric value to give to the user preference specified in UserPreferenceValue

title: IModelDoc2.SetUserPreferenceDoubleValue
signature:
System.Boolean SetUserPreferenceDoubleValue( 
   System.Int32
UserPreferenceValue
,
   System.Double
Value
)

parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference value as defined in swUserPreferenceDoubleValue_e

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Numeric value to give to the user preference specified in UserPreferenceValue

returns: True if the user preference is set successfully, false if not
remarks:
This method is equivalent to interactively setting document properties in the SOLIDWORKS Design software. See
System Options and Document Properties
for details.

examples.title: Get Excel Cell Value for Density (VBA)
